title: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment with laundry
posting_body: Only a block away from Mass.

Ave., in East Arlington and so close to Capital Theatre, Minuteman Bike Path & less than 1 mile to Alewife, this very well maintained sunny, spacious 2 bedroom and 1 bath is just waiting for you in this owner occupied two family home!

Many features such as gleaming hardwood floors throughout, spacious flow of the 5 rooms which include large eat in kitchen, formal dining room with built-in china closet & beam ceilings, large living room with deep coat closet, 2 great size bedrooms with big closets, washer and dryer free to use in basement, one off street parking spot for night time use only.
Absolutely NO Pets or Smoking Allowed.
FOR ONE PERSON, RENT IS NEGOTIABLE!
